content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in ragusa on june 24 2010 the case number is 595 but it does not provide any information about the parties involved or the details of the case the text explains the progress of a legal case regarding setoff costs the court has made a decision in a civil case brought by dm dima dr dimi and dd the court declares the dissolution of the community property inheritance between the parties the registered movable property including several vehicles has been seized and valued by a courtappointed expert dm owns twothirds of the property while the others own onefifteenth the court orders the sale of the property at a base price determined by the experts report the proceeds from the sale will be allocated to the parties based on their respective shares after deducting custody costs sale costs and registration costs the court also decides that the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the estate and plans for subsequent costs will be determined later
